actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the volume entitled "History of the Committee on Science and Technology, 1959-1979".

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of the volume entitled "History of the Committee on Science and Technology, 1959-1979" as a House document. Authorizes the printing of additional copies not to exceed a cost of $1,200 for the use of the Committee on Science and Technology.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of the volume entitled "History of the Committee on Science and Technology, 1959-1979".
